definitions.definition: The outer side of a window or door frame .
A revelation ; an uncovering of what was hidden in the scene or story.
examples: The comedian had been telling us about his sleep being disturbed by noise. Then came the reveal : he was sleeping on a bed in a department store.

main_definition: The outer side of a window or door frame .
secondary_definitions: ( cinematography , narratology , comedy , usually informal ) A revelation ; an uncovering of what was hidden in the scene or story.
